title: RAK12034 WisBlock 9-Axis Accelerometer Module Datasheet > RAK12034 WisBlock 9-Axis Accelerometer Module Datasheet > Overview > Description > RAK12034 9-Axis Accelerometer Module Overview
content:
The RAK12034 is a 9-axis accelerometer module, part of the RAKwireless WisBlock Sensor series. It is based on BMX160 Bosch Sensor, which is a highly integrated low-power 9-axis sensor providing precise acceleration, angular rate, and geomagnetic measurement in each spatial direction.  
Due to its small form factor and low-power consumption, it is ideal for smart wearables. Moreover, you can also use the BSX sensor data fusion software library of Bosch Sensortec to tweak the sensor's performance.
parent_content:
The RAK12034 is a 9-axis accelerometer module, part of the RAKwireless WisBlock Sensor series. It is based on BMX160 Bosch Sensor, which is a highly integrated low-power 9-axis sensor providing precise acceleration, angular rate, and geomagnetic measurement in each spatial direction.  
Due to its small form factor and low-power consumption, it is ideal for smart wearables. Moreover, you can also use the BSX sensor data fusion software library of Bosch Sensortec to tweak the sensor's performance.

title: RAK12034 WisBlock 9-Axis Accelerometer Module Datasheet > RAK12034 WisBlock 9-Axis Accelerometer Module Datasheet > Overview > Possible Applications > Applications and Features of RAK12034
content:
- Virtual and augmented reality
- Indoor navigation
- 3D scanning/indoor mapping
- Advanced gesture recognition
- Immersive gaming
- 9-axis motion detection
- Air mouse applications and pointers
- Pedometer/step counting
- Advanced system power management for mobile applications
- Optical image stabilization of camera modules
- Free-fall detection and warranty logging
parent_content:
- Virtual and augmented reality

- Air mouse applications and pointers

- Optical image stabilization of camera modules
- Free-fall detection and warranty logging

title: RAK12034 WisBlock 9-Axis Accelerometer Module Datasheet > RAK12034 WisBlock 9-Axis Accelerometer Module Datasheet > Specifications > Overview > Mounting > RAK12034 9-Axis Accelerometer Module Mounting
content:
The RAK12034 9-Axis Accelerometer Module can be mounted on the sensor slot of any WisBlock Base board.  
> **Image:** RAK12034 WisBlock 9-Axis Accelerometer Module mounting
parent_content:
The RAK12034 9-Axis Accelerometer Module can be mounted on the sensor slot of any WisBlock Base board.  
> **Image:** RAK12034 WisBlock 9-Axis Accelerometer Module mounting

title: RAK12034 WisBlock 9-Axis Accelerometer Module Datasheet > RAK12034 WisBlock 9-Axis Accelerometer Module Datasheet > Specifications > Hardware > Pin Definition > RAK12034 WisBlock Sensor Connector Pinout [TABLE]
content:
The RAK12034 comprises a standard WisBlock Sensor connector. The WisBlock Sensor connector allows the **RAK12034** module to be mounted on WisBlock Base board, such as RAK5005-O.  
The pin order of the connector and the pinout definition are shown in **Figure 2**.  
> **Image:** RAK12034 WisBlock 9-Axis Accelerometer Module pinout  
> **TIP:** NOTE
**I2C** related pins: **VCC** and **GND** are connected to WisBlock Sensor connector.
parent_content:
The RAK12034 comprises a standard WisBlock Sensor connector. The WisBlock Sensor connector allows the **RAK12034** module to be mounted on WisBlock Base board, such as RAK5005-O.  
The pin order of the connector and the pinout definition are shown in **Figure 2**.  
> **Image:** RAK12034 WisBlock 9-Axis Accelerometer Module pinout  
> **TIP:** NOTE
**I2C** related pins: **VCC** and **GND** are connected to WisBlock Sensor connector.

title: RAK12034 WisBlock 9-Axis Accelerometer Module Datasheet > RAK12034 WisBlock 9-Axis Accelerometer Module Datasheet > Specifications > Hardware > Mechanical Characteristics > WisConnector PCB Layout > WisConnector PCB Footprint and Recommendations [IMAGE]

RAK12034 WisBlock 9-Axis Accelerometer Module Datasheet > RAK12034 WisBlock 9-Axis Accelerometer Module Datasheet > Specifications > Hardware > Schematic Diagram > RAK12034 Default I2C Address and Pin Configuration
content:
By default, the **AP_AD0** pin is connected to VCC. And the default I2C address of the 9-Axis accelerometer is 1101001.
**R2** and **R3** are not needed in RAK12034 due to pull-up resistors existing on the WisBlock Base board.  
> **Image:** RAK12034 WisBlock 9-Axis Accelerometer Module schematic diagram
parent_content:

> **Image:** RAK12034 WisBlock 9-Axis Accelerometer Module schematic diagram
